程序包 com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.transactions

类 AddTransactionController

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.BaseController
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.transactions.AddTransactionController
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddTransactionController extends BaseController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for adding a new transaction. Handles user input, category selection, and transaction saving logic.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller and UI components. Loads user accounts and sets up category selection.
      指定者:
      initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
      参数:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if unknown
      resources - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if not localized

    • switchToExpense

      public void switchToExpense()
      Switches the transaction type to expense. Updates button styles and category availability.

    • switchToIncome

      public void switchToIncome()
      Switches the transaction type to income. Updates button styles and disables categories.
